definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The critical speed of one turbopump rotor on elastic support was computed by FEMQZ.
sentences.chinese: 计算分析了某涡轮泵转子在弹性支承下的临界转速。

sentences.english: The horse's strides are shorter than at the other canters, without losing elasticity and cadence.
sentences.chinese: 马的步幅比其他几种跑步较短，但却不失弹性与节奏。

sentences.english: Polyurethane elastomer systems for solvent-free spray-up were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 制备了无溶剂喷涂成型聚氨酯弹性体体系。

sentences.english: Superior quality elastic waistband with internal drawstring.
sentences.chinese: 卓越的品质与内部弹性腰带拉绳。

sentences.english: They have flexibility in their labor markets.
sentences.chinese: 中国的劳动力市场非常有弹性。

sentences.english: The batons, BR-M are made of a resilient rubber.
sentences.chinese: 型橡胶警棍由高弹性橡胶制成。

sentences.english: A physical spline is a thin piece of wood or other flexible material.
sentences.chinese: 物理样条是一块薄木片或其他有弹性的物质。

sentences.english: Before being fermented, the white chunks of tofu are plump and pliant . How filling they look!
sentences.chinese: 泡制前的豆腐块白鼓鼓的，富弹性，很有饱实感。

sentences.english: It has 13 pockets with tabs and an elastic-cord closure.
sentences.chinese: 他有13个带标签的隔层和一个弹性绳扣。

sentences.english: In vulcanization, a series of cross-links are introduced into an elastomer to give it strength.
sentences.chinese: 在硫化，一系列的交叉环节引入弹性体给它的实力。

sentences.english: Sets of hyperelastic analytical solution are presented with triangular function.
sentences.chinese: 用三角级数的形式给出了一组相应的超弹性解析解答。

sentences.english: Realizing data exchange to reflect coupling between fluid and structures is essential to solving static aeroelasticity problems.
sentences.chinese: 研究静气动弹性问题一大关键是要解决流固数据耦合。

sentences.english: Genuine Italian woven cotton elastic provides stretchability for more comfort.
sentences.chinese: 真正的意大利棉梭织弹性提供更舒适的拉伸。

sentences.english: Regenerative and reparative body oil that helps tissue elasticity, treating and preventing the appearance of stretch marks.
sentences.chinese: 再生和修复身体组织弹性，治疗和预防妊娠纹的出现。

sentences.english: One of educational system reforms is implementing flexible educational system, students have benefited from it.
sentences.chinese: 弹性学制给学生带来了益处，是高等教育改革的方向。

sentences.english: Spirochetes Long spirally twisted bacteria surrounded by a flexible wall.
sentences.chinese: 是具有弹性外鞘的长形螺旋盘绕细菌。

definition: (of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
